amendment.description: Amendment provides that stewardship contracts awarded prior to Feb. 7, 2014 shall be modified by the Secretary to include fire liability provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in part C of House Report 114-192 to request that stewardship contracts awarded prior to Feb 7, 2014 shall be modified by the Secretary to include fire liability provisions described in Section 604(d)(7) of the Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003 (16 U.S.C. 6591c).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Tipton.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
